price: 72. et d’observer la Çalât et de Le craindre. Et c’est vers Lui, certes, que vous serez ramenés en foule. »
arabic: وَأَنۡ أَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّقُوهُۚ وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-an aqīmū al-ṣalata wa-ittaqūhu wahuwa alladhī ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
